comment: Professor Garcia is a sweet guy and will assess to your needs. I also felt like he taught me a lot about how to try and understand other culture's beliefs and practices. Tests are mostly based on vocab, but they aren't too hard. The final project he has you do is cool, I wish I had spent more time on it, but he still gave me a 100 for it.

This professor's class was very easy. His attendance is mandatory and there are quizzes on his attendances sometimes but someone in the class can send it to you if you're not there. There is a lot of group work and also there is a big project kind of work at the end of the semester that you work with a group on and another about a son. Very easy!!

Their in-person lessons were good material-wise, and it was interesting to learn about, but the tests are more vocab and concept-based, so you have to memorize one thing from each lecture. There is a group work, and you have to read articles before class, which at times you could be quizzed on at random. Attendance is mandatory.

Professor Garcia is a great teacher, he is very passionate about Anthropology. However, I would not take his class again. It felt at times that his political and social views would seep into his lectures. Which overall made the classroom have a tense atmosphere at times, especially during group work. Nice guy, easy class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Professor Garcia is one of the most caring professors. Participation in class counts.

Professor Garcia was amazing. With lectures I normally struggle to pay attention, but I enjoyed his. There was a reading or video every class, but they were not hard and were discussed in class anyway. You could tell that he truly has a passion for anthropology and had a good way of teaching it. Attendance isn't mandatory but suggested.

comment: Mandatory attendance for a 100+ slideshow/1hr lectures. Only 3 grades: 2 tests, attendance, and project. No homework or anything to boost grade average. Either pass or fail the class. You must read 5-10 page articles or 10min to an hour video almost everyday just to pass the tests,readings only used for citing in test and nothing else. DNT FOR GPA.

comment: He is a communist who dislikes white people, men, and Christianity. Don't take him if you are even somewhat conservative. He is a heavy lecturer and likes to push his narrative. His tests are easy if you have a brain, I studied for 40 minutes prior to the test and aced it. Show up.

I was in 4490 not 1101.
I adore Dr. Garcia. They are so patient and understanding and I could tell they genuinely respected their students. The class was very very reading heavy but as long as you get the basic gist you'll be fine. We didnt have any tests, instead just a few papers and weekly discussion posts. Highly Recommend
I loved this class and professor! If you have the opportunity please take him, you wont regret it. I cannot say enough great things about him.

Grades consist over 3 writing assignments, and total of four weekly questions created about the readings. Class is normal just in class discussion about the readings. He is very laidback and understanding. Responses to emails and questions quickly.
